value:
$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|$w0|So, you have come to battle us?
This will be the second time
you face my blade.$k$pWe are all bound by a contract
with Princess Veronica.$k$pAnd yet I am also bound in another
way—by the deep loneliness I
see in her eyes.$k$pShe reminds me of one of my
siblings who was once held captive
in a joyless fortress.$k$pPerhaps you can understand
why I could never oppose her.
Or perhaps you cannot.$k$pEither way, it's time that my family
and I put an end to you. Camilla,
Leo, and Elise—we battle now!$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You have more talent than I thought.
But now my family and I know
what you can do.$k$pYou will never survive the battles
next to come—each of us, with our
loyal retainers at our side!$k$Sbs150|
